content: परिगम् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To go or walk round; तं हयं तत्र परिगम्य <ls>Rām.</ls>; यथा हि मेरुः सूर्येण नित्यशः परिगम्यते <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--2@} To surround; <ls>Śi. 9. 26</ls>; <ls>Bk. 10. 1</ls>; सेनापरिगत &c. {@--3@} To spread everywhere, pervade all directions. {@--4@} To attain to, obtain; वृषलतां &c. {@--5@} To know, understand, learn; <ls>R. 7. 71.</ls> {@--6@} To die, go forth (from this world); वयं येभ्यो जाताश्चिरपरिगता एव खलु ते <ls>Bh. 3. 38.</ls> {@--7@} To overpower, affect; as in क्षुधया परिगतः. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To pass or spend (time).
